summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1995 budget, decreasing or increasing as needed certain expenditure allowances in the 1995 budgets of various City departments and agencies from various City funds to provide for various costs and expenses not provided for in the 1995 budget by appropriation, reappropriation, and transfer from various City funds including the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council. (1995 Supplement)
